CustomField.formula: IF(ISBLANK(PersonMailingState), 0, IF(Household_Size_Including_Patient__pc > 0 && Household_Size_Including_Patient__pc < 9 && PersonMailingState != 'Alaska' && PersonMailingState != 'Hawaii', CASE(Household_Size_Including_Patient__pc, 1,$CustomMetadata.Federal_Poverty_Guidelines__mdt.FPL2021.X48_1__c, 2,$CustomMetadata.Federal_Poverty_Guidelines__mdt.FPL2021.X48_2__c, 3,$CustomMetadata.Federal_Poverty_Guidelines__mdt.FPL2021.X48_3__c, 4,$CustomMetadata.Federal_Poverty_Guidelines__mdt.FPL2021.X48_4__c, 5,$CustomMetadata.Federal_Poverty_Guidelines__mdt.FPL2021.X48_5__c, 6,$CustomMetadata.Federal_Poverty_Guidelines__mdt.FPL2021.X48_6__c, 7,$CustomMetadata.Federal_Poverty_Guidelines__mdt.FPL2021.X48_7__c, 8,$CustomMetadata.Federal_Poverty_Guidelines__mdt.FPL2021.X48_8__c, 0), IF(Household_Size_Including_Patient__pc > 0 && Household_Size_Including_Patient__pc < 9 && (PersonMailingState == 'Alaska'), CASE(Household_Size_Including_Patient__pc , 1,$CustomMetadata.Federal_Poverty_Guidelines__mdt.FPL2021.AK_1__c, 2,$CustomMetadata.Federal_Poverty_Guidelines__mdt.FPL2021.AK_2__c, 3,$CustomMetadata.Federal_Poverty_Guidelines__mdt.FPL2021.AK_3__c, 4,$CustomMetadata.Federal_Poverty_Guidelines__mdt.FPL2021.AK_4__c, 5,$CustomMetadata.Federal_Poverty_Guidelines__mdt.FPL2021.AK_5__c, 6,$CustomMetadata.Federal_Poverty_Guidelines__mdt.FPL2021.AK_6__c, 7,$CustomMetadata.Federal_Poverty_Guidelines__mdt.FPL2021.AK_7__c, 8,$CustomMetadata.Federal_Poverty_Guidelines__mdt.FPL2021.AK_8__c, 0), IF(Household_Size_Including_Patient__pc > 0 && Household_Size_Including_Patient__pc < 9 && ( PersonMailingState == 'Hawaii'), CASE(Household_Size_Including_Patient__pc , 1,$CustomMetadata.Federal_Poverty_Guidelines__mdt.FPL2021.HI_1__c, 2,$CustomMetadata.Federal_Poverty_Guidelines__mdt.FPL2021.HI_2__c, 3,$CustomMetadata.Federal_Poverty_Guidelines__mdt.FPL2021.HI_3__c, 4,$CustomMetadata.Federal_Poverty_Guidelines__mdt.FPL2021.HI_4__c, 5,$CustomMetadata.Federal_Poverty_Guidelines__mdt.FPL2021.HI_5__c, 6,$CustomMetadata.Federal_Poverty_Guidelines__mdt.FPL2021.HI_6__c, 7,$CustomMetadata.Federal_Poverty_Guidelines__mdt.FPL2021.HI_7__c, 8,$CustomMetadata.Federal_Poverty_Guidelines__mdt.FPL2021.HI_8__c, 0), IF(Household_Size_Including_Patient__pc > 8 && PersonMailingState != 'Alaska' && PersonMailingState != 'Hawaii', $CustomMetadata.Federal_Poverty_Guidelines__mdt.FPL2021.X48_8__c+($CustomMetadata.Federal_Poverty_Guidelines__mdt.FPL2021.X48_Over8__c*(Household_Size_Including_Patient__pc-8)), IF(Household_Size_Including_Patient__pc > 8 && (PersonMailingState == 'Alaska'), $CustomMetadata.Federal_Poverty_Guidelines__mdt.FPL2021.AK_8__c+($CustomMetadata.Federal_Poverty_Guidelines__mdt.FPL2021.AK_Over8__c*(Household_Size_Including_Patient__pc -8)), IF(Household_Size_Including_Patient__pc > 8 && (PersonMailingState == 'Hawaii'), $CustomMetadata.Federal_Poverty_Guidelines__mdt.FPL2021.HI_8__c+($CustomMetadata.Federal_Poverty_Guidelines__mdt.FPL2021.HI_Over8__c*(Household_Size_Including_Patient__pc -8)), 0 ) ) ) ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Federal Bracket
